name: nodefetch
description: Aplicação para buscar informações do sistema

scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux-x64 && npm run build:windows-x64
scripts.build:installers: npm run build:all && chmod +x install.sh && chmod +x install.bat
scripts.build:complete: npm run build:installers && cp install.sh install.bat dist/ && cd dist && zip -r nodefetch-linux.zip nodefetch-linux-x64 install.sh && zip -r nodefetch-windows.zip nodefetch-windows-x64.exe install.bat && cd ..
